[BrandsEye][brandseye] provides online monitoring, analytics,
and insights for social media data. We have a dedicated front end app that can be
used to up the *brands* (very much like topics) and *phrases* that you are interested
in tracking, and that also provides a suite of visualisation and anlytic tools for
examining the social media data that the account will now begin pulling in from
sources such as Twitter, Facebook, Google+, blogs, websites, and so on.
